entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH, Attawapiskat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:05 p.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
